Articles.Content:
It would be cool if there was an easter egg related to Oxygen Not Included. 

If you could find the asteroid colony with some dupes on it.

What is "Oxygen not included"?

A mod? A webcomic? a novel?

53 minutes ago, KerikBalm said:

What is "Oxygen not included"?

A mod? A webcomic? a novel?

It's a survival/asteroid colony building game.  It's quite fun.

While these two games are in my top 4 of all time, I don't think they will include a reference to a competitors product.   Plus, if your vessel would happen to get within physics range of the dupes, KSP would take one look at the ONI physics engine, twitch it's eye, have an aneurysm, and fall over dead.
